titre: g√¢ch√© par les incidents, la mauvaise foi, un appartement inutilisable sans clim en √©t√©

mauvais_points:
Pas d‚Äôaccueil √† l'arriv√© : oblig√© de t√©l√©phoner pour l‚Äôouverture de la porte de l'appartement puis d'obtenir la cl√©. L'ouverture par code de l'appartement est ing√©rable sans entrainement ni mode d'emploi ; il est de plus dangereux s'il n'est pas chang√© apr√®s chaque utilisateur. Par temps chaud il faut ouvrir les fen√™tres : alors le bruit du bar caf√© le soir et le matin celui de l‚Äôentrep√¥t en face est insupportable (emp√™che de dormir). Les fen√™tres de la cuisine sont sans rideau (volet int√©rieur) et donc sans intimit√© vis √† vis de le rue si on doit les ouvrir pour rafraichir l'appartement. L'immeuble est tr√®s vieux, l'escalier est sale, sombre et malodorant (poubelle)
Il n'y a pas de clim dans l'appartement par contre le chauffage dans la cuisine fonctionne en permanence en plein de mois de juillet 2019 (par grosse chaleur c'est d√©mentiel) Il nous a fallu t√©l√©phoner pour avoir les cl√©s et de nombreux essais pour utiliser le code de porte. Le lendemain il a fallu de 9H (coup de t√©l√©phone pour faire couper le chauffage) puis √† 12 H (pour rappeler car le chauffage fonctionnait encore) jusqu'√† 16H o√π l'administrative coup√© le chauffage. Soit 7h pour couper le chauffage en pleine √©t√©. La personne n'√©tant pas persuad√©e que c'√©tait son travail ? Un accueil tr√®s formaliste sans efficacit√© et de mauvaise foi.

Great and helpful host - Anne! THANK YOU/ Anne :) The place is lovely! The location is in a neighborhood, quiet and safe. It is not that far from public transportations. There are restaurants, bakeries and supermarkets around. There's kitchen in the apartment, so we can cook ourselves at the property.
Close to the center, the price was excellent, the facilities were clean.
Generally ok.

titre: Lovely quiet apt near tram stop and station
bons_points:
The apt is very well appointed - I especially liked the large walk-in shower. It was very quiet being situated though the back of a tenement block, so street noises were not heard. It is not in the most chic area being near the station, but the tram stop is 50m away and there is a large supermarket about 200m up the road.
For me I liked that there was a pedestrian walkway starting at the tram stop which led down to the river walkway - perfect for running - and a swimming pool about 5mins walk away.
The tram takes you quickly to the tourist areas of Castle, Bouffay, Cathedral (3 stops).
I arrived early and Anna's daughter was there to let me checkin early.
The 'Passage Secret' is the tenement stairway with a locked streetdoor which the hairdresser nextdoor opens on request. There was a bit of confusion as I thought he had the apt key and neither of us realised that Anna's daughter was waiting in the apt and he was just to let me through the streetdoor - but it got sorted out.

The apartment is close to the train station, and very close to the tram line which connects easily to the historical center and pretty much all attractions. The unit is very decent in size and the bedroom is large. The linens were clean and the bed comfortable. The kitchen is well equipped. Heating, hot water and internet access were nicely supplied. The host spoke very good English and was waiting us at the door when we arrived. The process of leaving was effortless, too.
Nice place ,modern and super clean . . Host friendly ,good info

Good location, near to the train station, supermarket, airport shuttle and tram lines. 
The apartment has everything you need fully equipped kitchen. The bathroom has the best shower I have ever experienced. 
Great if traveling alone or with another friend or family member. 
Anne was very helpful and friendly. 
The information on booking.com especially the directions were very helpful. 
Wish I had more than one night to explore Nante
Good price especially as I was traveling alone.
